subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Jerry Sandusky’s wife, Dorothy, could be called to testify in his defense this week. There are hints that she initially failed to grasp the seriousness of the charges against him.
snippet: Jerry Sandusky’s wife, Dorothy, could be called to testify in his defense this week. There are hints that she initially failed to grasp the seriousness of the charges against him.
